value:
Being summoned here is a good
chance for me to observe and learn.
That's important for a king.

Peace has only just dawned in our
kingdom, but I'll remain here and help
it break in Askr as well.$k$pThere is no true peace if my world is
the only one that knows it.

I have a lot of friends to support me. I
hope that someday you'll think of me
as such a friend, too.

Would you mind showing me the way
to the library?$k$pLearning about the history and culture
of this world will surely offer valuable
insight I can take back to my own.

Huh?! Oh, you startled me... I was
just sneaking a snack. Oranges are
pretty popular in my homeland.

It seems $Nf
has been worrying about you. How
are you doing?

This power will protect our
kingdom and those we hold dear.

A fitting result for the king of the
One Kingdom of Valentia.
Ugh... How disappointing...

What a refreshing feeling. Like a
new door has opened before me.

I serve the One Kingdom of Valentia.
They call me the Saint-King Alm. I
vow my strength to you and yours.

I may be Saint-King Alm, but I have
every intention of remaining true to
myself. But, well...$k$pThat's easier said than done thanks
to the daily tasks required of a king.$k$pUnless there's a major battle, I have
to leave the fighting to Clive, Lukas,
and the knights.$k$pI hadn't even set foot on a battlefield
for some time before arriving here.$k$pI'm glad I can use my experience and
strength to help the people of Askr.
Every day has been wholly fulfilling.$k$pThere aren't many people I can admit
that to, so I'm thankful to have met
you here in this world.$k$pThank you for letting me relive my life
as a fighter, if even for a moment. It's
been like a dream.$k$pAnd even after I wake from it, I won't
forget you.
でやあっ！
いくよ！
うわあっ…！
甘かった…
End of the line!
You won't escape!
For the future!
It's over!
Ugh... Celica...
Hmmm....
I'm Alm, king of the One Kingdom of Valentia.
Gah! Oh, it's just you... You startled me.
I'll carry on my father's will...and prove that I can be a great king.
We'll be together from now on, Celica. I will never leave your side.
Being a king doesn't change who I am. I want to keep fighting at everyone's side.
A world where people live and thrive based on their own efforts, not the whims of the gods...
There are so many things I can learn from you. Will you continue to guide me?
A solid move.
Like this?
For our future.
